void photon_flux (double *Np, double *Nptot, double *Nbtot, double *QCSNR, double *QCNEA, int nwvl, double *wvls, double *mags, double dxsa, int iscircle, double pixtheta, double dt, double za, double *strehl, double imperrnm, double *thruput, double *qe, double rne)
 Compute subaperture star flux from magnitude, subaperture size, sample period, etc.

Detailed Description

Routines that calculates star flux from magnitude.

Function Documentation

void photon_flux ( double *  Np,
double *  Nptot,
double *  Nbtot,

double *  QCNEA,

double *  mags,

Compute subaperture star flux from magnitude, subaperture size, sample period, etc.

Parameters:
[out] Np number of total signal at each wvl.
[out] Nptot total signal (sum of Np).
[out] Nbtot number of background photon per pixel
[out] QCSNR signal to noise ratio for a Quadcell
[out] QCNEA noise equivalent angle for a Quadcell with Nyquist sampling
[in] nwvl number of wavelength.
[in] wvls vector of wavelength
[in] mags vector of magnitudes
[in] dxsa subaperture side length
[in] iscircle where the subaperture is circle/part of a circle. true for TT/TTFA sensors.
[in] pixtheta pixel extense in radian
[in] dt sampling period in seconds
[in] za zenith angle
[in] strehl Strehl of the image. set to 1 for full flux.
[in] imperrnm Implementation error in nm
[in] thruput end to end optical throughput
[in] qe detector quantum efficiency.
[in] rne detector read out noise. 
00059           {
00060     /*
00061        Written 2010-06-09;
00062        Tested PASS 2010-06-09;
00063      */
00064     double pixas=pixtheta*206265;//in arcsec.
00065     double Npsum=0;
00066     double Nbsum=0;
00067     double saa;
00068     if(iscircle){
00069     saa=M_PI*pow(dxsa*0.5,2);
00070     }else{
00071     saa=pow(dxsa,2);
00072     }
00073     if(!Np){
00074     Np=alloca(sizeof(double)*nwvl);
00075     }
00076     double Npwvl=0;
00077     for(int iwvl=0; iwvl<nwvl; iwvl++){
00078     double wvl=wvls[iwvl];
00079     double Z=0, ZB=0;
00080     double imperr_rad2=pow(imperrnm*1e-9*(2*M_PI/wvl),2);
00081     double imperr_strehl=exp(-imperr_rad2);
00082     if(fabs(wvl-1.25e-6)<1.e-7){ //J band
00083         Z=Z_J; ZB=pow(10,-MB_J/2.5)*Z_J;
00084     }else if(fabs(wvl-1.65e-6)<1.e-7){//H band
00085         Z=Z_H; ZB=pow(10,-MB_H/2.5)*Z_H;
00086     }else if(fabs(wvl-2.2e-6)<1.e-7){//K band
00087         Z=Z_K; ZB=pow(10,-MB_K/2.5)*Z_K;
00088     }else{
00089         error("Invalid");
00090     }
00091     double absorp=(1./cos(za)-1)*(-log(0.98));//atmosphere absorption.
00092     double strehl_iwvl=1;
00093     if(strehl){
00094         strehl_iwvl=strehl[iwvl];
00095     }
00096     Np[iwvl]=dt*saa*pow(10,-(absorp+mags[iwvl])/2.5)*Z
00097         *thruput[iwvl]*qe[iwvl]*strehl_iwvl*imperr_strehl;
00098     Npsum+=Np[iwvl];
00099     Nbsum+=dt*saa*pow(pixas,2)*ZB*thruput[iwvl]*qe[iwvl];
00100     Npwvl+=Np[iwvl]/wvl;
00101     }
00102     double wvlm=Npsum/Npwvl; //Average wavelength 1/mean(1/wvl) with signal weighting
00103     double deltheta=wvlm/dxsa;
00104     double thetaB=3*M_PI*deltheta/16;
00105     double snr=Npsum/sqrt(Npsum+4*Nbsum+4*pow(rne,2));
00106     if(Nptot) *Nptot=Npsum;
00107     if(Nbtot) *Nbtot=Nbsum;
00108     if(QCSNR) *QCSNR=snr;
00109     if(QCNEA) *QCNEA=thetaB/snr;
00110 }
